bookmarks.title: Web.dev
bookmarks.description: Guidance to build modern web experiences that work on any browser. Learn about web vitals, PWAs, and more.

bookmarks.title: Claude
bookmarks.description: An AI assistant created by Anthropic that can help with analysis, writing, coding, math, and creative tasks through natural conversation.

bookmarks.title: Flexbox Zombies
bookmarks.description: Master flexbox layout in CSS by playing a survival game. Use flexbox to position your crossbow and survive the zombie apocalypse.

bookmarks.title: CodePen
bookmarks.description: An online code editor and social development environment for front-end designers and developers.

bookmarks.title: CSS Grid Garden
bookmarks.description: A game for learning CSS grid layout. Grow your carrot garden by writing CSS grid code.

bookmarks.title: freeCodeCamp
bookmarks.description: Learn to code for free. Build projects. Earn certifications. An open source community that helps you learn to code with free online courses and certifications.

bookmarks.title: JavaScript.info
bookmarks.description: The Modern JavaScript Tutorial. How it's done now. From the basics to advanced topics with simple, but detailed explanations.

bookmarks.title: Tailwind CSS
bookmarks.description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building modern websites without ever leaving your HTML.
